statements: SELECT client_id, workout_date, workout_duration_minutes, calories_burned, heart_rate FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT calories_burned, workout_duration_minutes, heart_rate, client_id, workout_date FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, SUM(calories_burned) AS total_calories FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT workout_date, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY workout_date;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE calories_burned > 500 ORDER BY workout_date DESC, workout_duration_minutes ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT client_id, workout_duration_minutes, heart_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE heart_rate >= 120 AND workout_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY heart_rate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT client_id, calories_burned FROM performance_metrics WHERE workout_date = '2022-01-15' AND calories_burned < 300 ORDER BY client_id ASC
SELECT AVG(calories_burned) AS avg_calories, MAX(workout_duration_minutes) AS max_duration FROM performance_metrics WHERE workout_date BETWEEN '2021-07-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT client_id, workout_date, heart_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE calories_burned > 400 OR (workout_duration_minutes > 30 AND heart_rate < 100) ORDER BY client_id, workout_date ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT client_name, weight FROM Clients WHERE height < 150;
SELECT client_id, client_name, age FROM Clients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT plan_date, workout_type FROM WorkoutPlans WHERE duration >= 60;
SELECT client_name, plan_date, workout_type FROM Clients JOIN WorkoutPlans ON Clients.client_id = WorkoutPlans.client_id;
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, weight FROM Clients WHERE weight >= 50 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM WorkoutPlans WHERE plan_date between '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND workout_type = 'Cardio' ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT client_name, age, weight, WorkoutPlans.plan_date FROM Clients JOIN WorkoutPlans ON Clients.client_id = WorkoutPlans.client_id ORDER BY plan_date DESC;

SELECT Clients.client_name, Clients.age, WorkoutPlans.workout_type, WorkoutPlans.duration FROM Clients LEFT JOIN WorkoutPlans ON Clients.client_id = WorkoutPlans.client_id WHERE WorkoutPlans.duration > 30 ORDER BY Clients.client_name ASC, WorkoutPlans.plan_date ASC;
SELECT client_id, workout_date, workout_duration_minutes FROM clients_performance_metrics;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM workout_plans ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, performance_score FROM progress_monitoring WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM workout_plans WHERE plan_duration_days >= 30;
SELECT client_id, heart_rate FROM clients_performance_metrics ORDER BY heart_rate ASC;
SELECT client_id, workout_date, workout_duration_minutes FROM clients_performance_metrics ORDER BY workout_date ASC, workout_duration_minutes DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT plan_name, plan_duration_days FROM workout_plans WHERE plan_duration_days > 30 ORDER BY plan_duration_days DESC
SELECT client_id, MAX(calories_burned) AS max_calories_burned FROM clients_performance_metrics GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY max_calories_burned DESC
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM workout_plans WHERE LENGTH(plan_description) > 50 ORDER BY plan_name ASC

SELECT pm.client_id, AVG(pm.performance_score) AS average_score, COUNT(cp.client_id) AS total_workouts FROM progress_monitoring pm INNER JOIN clients_performance_metrics cp ON pm.client_id = cp.client_id GROUP BY pm.client_id ORDER BY average_score DESC
SELECT * FROM Clients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT client_name, age, gender FROM Clients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT client_name, height, weight FROM Clients WHERE height > 170;
SELECT * FROM Workouts WHERE target_area='Legs';
SELECT metric_id, start_date, duration_minutes FROM Metrics ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT client_name, age FROM Clients WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM Workouts WHERE target_area='Legs' ORDER BY workout_id DESC
SELECT client_name, age, gender, weight FROM Clients JOIN Progress ON Clients.client_id = Progress.client_id WHERE weight_lifted > 100 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT client_name, start_date, completion_date, duration_minutes FROM Clients JOIN Metrics ON Clients.client_id = Metrics.client_id WHERE gender='Female' AND duration_minutes < 60

SELECT client_name, workout_name, target_area, weight_lifted, reps, sets FROM Clients JOIN Metrics ON Clients.client_id = Metrics.client_id JOIN Workouts ON Metrics.workout_id = Workouts.workout_id ORDER BY client_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Clients ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, plan_name, plan_description FROM WorkoutPlans WHERE LENGTH(plan_description) > 0;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_score > 8 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT id, report_name, analysis_date FROM AnalysisReports WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY performance_score DESC, workout_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, email FROM Clients WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM WorkoutPlans WHERE LENGTH(plan_description) > 100;
SELECT client_id, progress_date, AVG(weight) AS avg_weight FROM ProgressTracking GROUP BY client_id, progress_date HAVING AVG(weight) > 70 ORDER BY avg_weight DESC;
SELECT report_name, analysis_date, insights FROM AnalysisReports WHERE client_id = 5 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
